header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Reading, getting a new car, changing tyres, reminiscing about watching Button Moon, friendship
header.activity: Family talking about reading annuals, getting a new car, friendship, leaves changing colour

body.u: right now I am reading the Simpson's annual two thousand and ten
and so far I've already read erm a book that says yes Flanders Santa does exist
and now I'm reading a a story that I can't remember what it's what it's called but it's where Bart is behind bars
so he's been sent to prison
and you were saying you were reading the Beano before?
annual two thousand and six and two thousand and eight
there weren't any other Beano annuals at school and so the Simpsons annual
fair enough and is it good?
has it got things that you can do in it? but I suppose you can't cos it's a school book
what do you mean by that?
mazes er word searches that sort of thing
do you just want one hot crossed bun in your packed lunch?
yes and I I have got into one interview which includes Bart's un s oh llike top twenty I think of Bart's unspeakable phrases
and and it's like eighteen or over private adults only and stuff like that no skateboarding
these are phrases that Bart has done?
no these are phrases that Bart's think bart thinks are unspeakable
ah okay your hair is like a a crazy crazy nest
isn't it? it's all sticky uppy
are you looking forward to going to 's?
and you're having round but erm yeah I want you to be coming home a bit earlier so I can spend a bit of time with you before you go to dad's
well you're going to be picking me up
she's the nicest she's the nicest people I know
I know yeah ah well you make sure you tell her that well I think is the nicest big person I know
no but is being a friend he was the first friend I got in this village and he's been lovely
he's helped me out a lot
since I've been on my own
but you're going to dump him the second you buy the car off him
well first of all I'm not going out with
yeah but you can still dump your friends

that would be horrible yes so I'm we're gonna get the new car well new to us car on Monday okay? and then we have two weeks where I'm insured on both cars and I'm gonna want to run down the other car petrol wise cos for some reason I put loads of petrol in it well I know why it's cos I teach I'm going to teach in tomorrow which is quite a way away and on Tuesday and I need a lot of petrol for both of those but yeah I want to use up most of that petrol and then we've got to swap tyres over
yeah for the n for the new one to the old
from the silver car to the black car and then I'm gonna try and sell the silver car
is this the name you've decided to give to our car?
I will miss our car it's been a good family car
we need to unpack everything and make sure it's clean
yeah do you know what you guys could do?
next week which would be very helpful straight after school on Tuesday just before Brownies we could do a we could wash the car
yes please I love washing the car
why? to make it look like it's in good condition?
mm mm just to make it look nice
if we're going to give it away then why do we want to make it look nice?
so people think oh that looks alright
rather than think er that looks mucky
you could wash both our new car and the old car
yes that's what I said so people would buy it
people don't buy cars because it looks clean it's just helpful that's all
but it's particularly mucky our car so it does need a clean anyway
it might be easier to change things over when we've bo got both cars there
rather than be taking everything out of his h into the house and then putting it in the car I might as well wait until they're parked next to each other
me and can play in the tyres we can go woo woo wa di woo oops no more flat screen TV
and it's for that reason that I may do that when you're not around
hey look there's a flat screen TV in Daisy's room
let's play with a tyre woo woo
smash numb and this is Daisy no more
mm I'm going to smash that 's flat screen TV with a tyre
who is ? our next door neighbour?
how do you know he's got a flat screen TV? I bet he hasn't
well I heard him say flat screen TV flat screen TV
erm uh I wish I wish not
well they are going to his house
so do you need to buy something secret at the w lunchtime?
I don't mean that kind of pop off I I went into space I really did I really did
oh that reminds me of Button Moon do you remember Button Moon don't you?
yeah mm but we can't see it now
well you can the DVD player
in the car is broken yes
I'm pretty sure Button Moon is okay
but Button Moon is a DVD so we could watch it here but you're a bit too old for it now
I like the ten met I like the last one with the ten-metre board boing boing smash boom
I like the witch episode and it's funny that it's not always erm the guy the guy that goes to Button Moon it's not always about him going to Button Moon
yeah it's sometimes about his children
I think they were just kind of learning how to make programmes for children when they were doing it
cos it's a long time ago it was done when I was little
it seemed like good when it seemed well it made my day when I was little
yeah I forgot to send a cheque in for your football so I have to email
and I'll have to checkmate you
no yes so I've got a cold I came down with a cold last night so be careful that you don't just you know check how you're feeling
and I'm sta I've mum and me think that and maybe erm that we should take you to the hearing aid soon
I'm not deaf you know I heard
no just to check your hearing with the doctor if you feel that it's quite bad
no not if it hurts if you're struggling to hear people
I mean you might just have a mild hearing issue like me I can't hear anybody can I really?
says he can't hear any erm
oh he does have a problem yeah he's got
something implanted into his ear now
says sometimes he can't see properly and his dad says get some glasses and he says that and I said why don't you get some glasses? and said that's what my dad says to do
well why don't they arrange for him to have an eye test then?
I'm not sure maybe he's lying
mm Mr says things have calmed down a bit though between and you cos 's sort of he was very possessive wasn't he for a while?
well it's calmed down on my side because I'm just ignoring him a huge amount more

well that's what I said I said it still was an issue but I think is not trying so much to sort of not let you be 's friend is he? that was his main issue or being left out or something how's at the moment ?
she was because she erm let me play her mum's phone
but she's being alright with you do you know what? you know ?

in your class little she's not she's having some trouble with some of the girls in your class but she said to her mum she said do you know what? has always been kind to me and lovely she's like she's like the best friend I could have isn't that nice?

yeah because sometimes I because every day when I go happy birthday to mummy happy birthday to mummy happy birthday dear mummy happy birthday to mummy and what she says it is my birthday mummy where's my
you're pretending 's your mum? but yeah so
yeah and she's pretending I'm her daughter
good just always be nice to people that's the thing isn't it?

I am and once said that erm everyone was I was being mean to her but I wasn't I just said erm it was our otters song ch it goes like this we are otters we're year two's otters play and otters whoosh we are top of key stage one we always help everyone

we eat off our belly and our homes are very smelly we like to we love to play in this s we we love to flip and flap in the sea and we flip and flap in the sea and we like and we like and we love shellfish and seaweed
that's my verse and when we said seaweed I went sea weed like sea weed and said that er you were being a bit mean to me
I was like sea weed and liked it and erm then
right stop chatting for a minute cos you need to finish your breakfast
is this going to be a C joke? cos an acorn doesn't make any sense does it?
it's not gonna be a C joke
alright I don't know why did the acorn blush?
get a move on don't deconstruct your bagel get on and eat it because I need you to be brushing your teeth really now
hey mum if you say why did the something something something er something? and someone says I don't know you could say neither do I
if I said something something something
that would be a really boring joke wouldn't it?
no I mean if you said why did the acorn blush? and they said I don't know you could say I don't either
I think that's only a joke you can do once in a while though isn't it?
no why did the acorn blush?
oh I'm gonna put extra socks on I think
no it's a different joke about the acorn
are you nearly ready ? you haven't finished your toast yet
do leaves change colour on an acorn tree
erm mm I don't think they do really actually I think they all pretty much stay green
lots of lots of trees do change colour but not the oak tree
I don't really know cos I have never seen an oak cos I'm gonna check if it's erm I think it's maybe an evergreen tree
what is? an oak tree? no it isn't an evergreen
think about mighty oak tree in Percy and the Park Keeper stories
I am a never green tree
I don't have any leaves at Christmas still no leaves
you do have one leaf me
you're the lea the leaf are you? you're a pretty big leaf
I'm a never green tree but I still have one leaf
